subject: Hello
body:
Hello  
Since you are not aware of this person before, we urge you to send us the listed information below for the immediate processing/release of the approved Fund to you.
1) Full name
2) Address 
3) Phone, fax, and mobile phone line
4) A copy of Your identification Card or passport
Waiting to hear from you immediately.
Regards 
Tom Healan

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Tom Healan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really excited about this opportunity! Could you please tell me more about the fund? How was it approved and what is it intended for? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Hello David
body:
Hello David

Since you are not aware of this person before, we urge you to send us the
listed information for the immediate release of the approved Fund to you.

1) Full name
2) Address
3) Phone, fax, and mobile phone line
4) A copy of Your identification Card or passport

Waiting to hear from you immediately.
Regards
Tom Healan

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
Hello Tom,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by this approved fund you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? How did it come about and why has it been approved for me?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Hello David
body:
Hello David

Thank you for your email response and content well noted. Sir, during every
end of the first quarter the United Nations Organization in collaboration
with International Monitory Fund do organize a promo in the form of a grant
with active email users with Yahoo and Microsoft.  For the year 2023, and
your email address is among the winners in a random World Wide Web
computerized draw system, extracted from over a million companies and
individual email addresses of the people that are active online and your
email came out victorious.

Sir, the sum of US$7.5MILLION was approved by the IMF to be paid to you as
one of the lucky winners but to our surprise, we received a claim
notification from one Mr. Smith Joseph who said he is your family Lawyer
from the United Kingdom that you instructed /directed him for file a claim
of the Fund in his own name as your next of kin for the release of the Fund
to him, this made us get in contact with you in confirming if really you
are the one that instructed him to claim the Fund on your behalf, which
from your email it shows you never hard knowledge of knowing this so-called
Mr. Smith Joseph.

Sir, in order to release the approved Fund to you as the rightful
beneficiary as listed on our payment dossier from the IMF, we urge you to
send us the listed information for the immediate release of the approved
Fund to you.

1) Full Name-
2) Home Address-
3) Phone, fax, and mobile phone line-
4) A copy of your identification Card or passport

 I do hope my explanation has cleared the content of the email you received
from us and If you have any objection do immediate Contact:

Waiting to hear from you immediately.
Regards
Tom Healan

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
Hello Tom,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite surprising to hear about this grant and the claim from Mr. Smith Joseph. I must admit, I don't recall instructing anyone to claim any funds on my behalf.

Could you please provide more information about this grant? How was it decided that my email would be among the winners? And how did Mr. Smith Joseph come into the picture?

I'm also curious about the process of releasing these funds. What steps are involved and how long does it usually take?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
Hello Tom,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite surprising to hear about this Mr. Smith Joseph claiming to be my family lawyer. I can assure you that I have no knowledge of him or any instructions given to claim the fund on my behalf.

I'm curious, how was my email address selected in this random World Wide Web draw system? And could you please provide more information about this grant organized by the United Nations and Monitory Fund?

Also, I would like to know more about the process involved in releasing the approved fund. What are the steps I need to take?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Hello David
body:
Hello David

Sir, donâ€™t be curious how your email address was selected in this random
World Wide Web draw system. Your email came out victorious and for us to
provide more evidence about this grant organized by the United Nations and
Monetary Fund. you need to re-confirm your details to us to issue your
Winning Certificate with our Organization.

Waiting to hear from you immediately.
Regards
Tom Healan

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
Hello Tom,

Wow, that's really exciting news! I can't believe my email was selected. Can you tell me more about this grant? How does the selection process work? And what is the purpose of this grant?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Hello David
body:
Hello David

Sir, There is nothing else I can explain about this transaction, If you
can't provide your details to us to issue your Winning Certificate with our
Organization. Then forget about it.

Waiting to hear from you immediately.
Regards
Tom Healan

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
Hello Tom,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm really excited about this winning! Could you please tell me more about it? Like, how was I chosen and what exactly have I won? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
Oh, I assure you, I am quite serious! Could you please elaborate on why you might think otherwise?

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
I have answered your questions and if your really serious to claim your
Winning Fund provide your details or your name will removed from our file.

subject: Re: Hello David
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about this winning fund! Could you please tell me more about it? How was I chosen and what is the process to claim it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David
